name: THE FIRST EVER MARVEL SNAKE GAME
name_original: THE FIRST EVER MARVEL SNAKE GAME
description: This is a snake game inspired by the upcoming marvel movie, DOCTOR STRANGE IN THE MULTIVERSE OF MADNESS. It features the 3 main charactes, 2 of which also happen to be my favourite characters from the MCU (Doctor strange and Scarlet witch.) It combines my favorite childhood game with my greatest interest. Hope you ENJOY!
